body.name: TMY Bluetooth Projector with DVD Player Built in, 1080P Outdoor Projector with 9500 Lumen, Mini Portable DVD Projector Compatible with Smartphone/PC/TV Stick/HDMI/AV/USB/TF, indoor & outdoor use
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 31 mins
features: 🔆【2-in-1 Home Theater System】You not only purchased a home projector, but also a DVD player. With built-in DVD player, makes it easier to watch your favorite movies without any connection. In addition, with USB/HDMI/AV/Micro SD/Audio port, this small projector can widely connect with most device, like smartphone,TV stick,TV Box, Game Player, Laptop, PC, USB, PS4, etc. This video projector can be used indoors or outdoors, and it will bring you endless happy moments with your family or friends!

🔆【Upgraded Bluetooth 5.1】With powerful built in speaker, you don't need to prepare an additional speaker to enjoy high-quality sound effects. Also, this movie projector equips Bluetooth pairing function, you can connect your ideal Bluetooth speaker or headphone wirelessly at any time to get more wonderful sound, and enjoy the fun of private cinema.

🔆【1080P & 9500 Lumens】This phone projector provides brilliant images for bedroom and outdoor with 9500 Lumens, 4:3 aspect ratio and 10000:1 high contrast. Moreover, we have improved the cooling system, reducing noise while maintaining efficient heat dissipation, allowing you to enjoy a quiet movie night.

🔆【Craftsmanship Design -- Minimalist, Unique, and Convenient】Unique trumpet shaped lens design, Fish bone pattern design on the body, Unique knob keystone design, Press-type disc cover -- with these unique design elements, this led projector will bring you a unique visual experience.

🔆【What Will You Get】 Not only you can get a Bluetooth projector with a built-in DVD player, but also you can obtain the HDMI and AV cables required to connect most devices; In addition, you will also receive LIFELONG after-support and professional technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TMY Latest DVD Projector with Bluetooth Function. You not only purchased a home projector, but also a DVD player. With this 2-in-1 Bluetooth projector, you will watch your favorite movies without any additional connection, and you will enjoy endless happy moments with your family or friends!
One Mini Video Projector, Brings You Double Happiness!

TMY movie projector is perfectly compatible with TV stick/Chrome-cast. It equips HDMI/AV/USB/SD ports, which can be easily connected to a variety of media devices, such Laptop, PC, TV Box, PS4 and so on. You can experience more fun by connecting these devices with the portable projector.
Explore More Functions of This LED Projector!

Not only you can get a Bluetooth projector with a built-in DVD player, but also you can obtain the HDMI and AV cables required to connect most devices; In addition, you will also receive LIFELONG after-support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This projector is very easy to setup with a blue tooth speaker. At first, the remote seemed a little stiff to use but the more you use it, the better it worked. The video quality is great and the sound quality only depends on the Bluetooth speaker that you use. The internal speaker on the projector is ok but not great if you are watching a movie where sound quality is preferred. We used a firestick as a source for streaming. I have not tried to use my phone to connect to it. I’m not sure how it is possible. Overall, this is a great affordable option if you have a nice dark room to watch movies. The same will go for outdoor use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Making the screen bigger
reviews.reviewText: We cannot make the projector screen size bigger....??? Other than that it works....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was having problems with the projector past the return period and the company reached out to me and kindly sent me a new one, which was very nice of them. The new one is working a lot better and I appreciate the customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All parts are in the box.
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for My grandkids can't use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Projects super nice.
reviews.reviewText: I used this for my college dorm to project on my wall because my monitors do not have speakers. I love it. I prop it up on a box and it gives me about 50 inch vision on my wall. The sound is surprisingly good for such a compact unit. Definitely gonna keep this for my years in school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best projector in the market right now
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of upgrading my outdoor movie nights with the TMY Bluetooth Projector with DVD Player Built-in, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer! This projector has transformed my backyard into a cinematic paradise, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The TMY projector boasts a stunning 1080P resolution that delivers crisp and vibrant images. Whether I'm watching my favorite films or streaming content from my devices, the clarity and detail are remarkable. The colors are rich and true to life, and the contrast is spot-on, making every movie night an immersive experience. Pairing my devices with the TMY projector is a breeze thanks to its Bluetooth capabilities. Whether it's my smartphone, tablet, or laptop, I can easily connect and stream content wirelessly. The Bluetooth speaker compatibility is a fantastic addition, delivering impressive audio quality without the need for external speakers. Setting up and using the TMY projector is straightforward, even for someone like me who isn't particularly tech-savvy. The remote control is intuitive, and the on-screen menu is user-friendly. I also appreciate the keystone correction feature, which allows me to adjust the image to fit perfectly on my outdoor screen.
